name.str_pl: pairs of Ultradyne C4 iron sights

description: A pair of uniquely-designed folding iron sights, with both posts using concentric circles for faster target acquisition, sacrificing precision at range.  Can be flipped down to allow use of other sights.
//aim_speed_modifier: +3 for unique design allowing for faster target acquisition

name.str_pl: pairs of Scalarworks PEAK iron sights

description: A pair of fixed iron sights.  Touted as being some of the best fixed sights in the world, this pair offers a sillouette of the classic AR-15 iron sights, while refining the overall design for performance, lower weight, and build quality.

//notes: comes in black and FDE color schemes
tritium front post is an optional accessory, but we assume it comes as a default for this particular model
takes standard A2 front posts, giving these sights around 10 MOA of dispersion
description: A pair of folding iron sights, with a unique diamond-shape design.  Tritium-illuminated posts and a relatively-large rear-sight aperture allow for faster target acquisition.  Can be flipped down to allow use of other sights.

name.str_pl: pairs of Spike's Tactical micro iron sights

description: A pair of compact folding iron sights.  Front sight features a thin post, enabling more accurate shots at longer distances, without the usual disadvantages of slower target acquisition.  Can be flipped down to allow use of other sights.

//notes: length of both sights added (0.854 + 0.88 in.) to emulate both sights stacked together in the inventory
height is taken from the tallest (rear) sight of the pair
slightly inaccurate, since it assumes total height is height from top of rail to aperture

//sight_dispersion: front post width is presumed from visuals to be 0.35 in.

name.str_pl: pairs of Troy Industries iron sights

description: A pair of folding iron sights, with a design reminiscent of the classic M1 Garand sights.  Can be flipped down to allow use of other sights.

//notes: width is taken from the widest (rear) sight of the pair
length of both sights added (1.064 + 1.063 in.) to emulate both sights stacked together in the inventory
height is taken from the tallest (rear) sight of the pair
slightly inaccurate, since it assumes total height is height from top of rail to aperture
come in black, FDE, and OD green color schemes

name.str_pl: pairs of Magpul MBUS 3 iron sights

description: A pair of folding iron sights made of impact-resistant polymer.  The material makes these sights lightweight, without sacrificing durable, as proven by the long-standing popularity of this design.  Can be flipped down to allow use of other sights.

//notes: length when deployed is assumed from a previous model in the series, then added (1.5 + 1.5 in.) to emulate both sights stacked together in the inventory
height is calculated as 1.41 in. (centerline height of these sights) × 1.1 (to add the remaining height above rail + rough height of rail mount)
